All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class UIMovieViewPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

This panel manages movies for a movie map view.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

public UIMovieViewPanel(javax.swing.JFrame parent,
                        NodeSummary node,
                        UINodeContentDialog tabbedPane,

Constructor.

Parameters:
parent - the parent frame for the dialog this panel is in.
pane - the current movie map view pane for this node.
node - the current node to list the movies for.
tabbedPane - the parent dialog this panel is in.
props - the MovieProperties that called this dialog - so they can be highlighted.
